VLANId.longDescription: The value of this property shall be used to indicate the VLAN identifier for this VLAN.
VLANId.description: This indicates the VLAN identifier for this VLAN.

VLANEnable.longDescription: The value of this property shall be used to indicate if this VLAN is enabled for this interface.
VLANEnable.description: This indicates if this VLAN is enabled.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

VLAN.longDescription: This type shall contain any attributes of a Virtual LAN.
VLAN.description: This type describes the attributes of a Virtual LAN.

VLANId.longDescription: The value of this property shall be used to indicate the VLAN identifier for this VLAN.
VLANId.description: This indicates the VLAN identifier for this VLAN.

VLANEnable.longDescription: The value of this property shall be used to indicate if this VLAN is enabled for this interface.
VLANEnable.description: This indicates if this VLAN is enabled.

Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.
Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

VLanNetworkInterface.longDescription: This resource shall contain any attributes of a Virtual LAN.
VLanNetworkInterface.description: This resource describes the attributes of a Virtual LAN.
